parse.title: List of incidents of violence against women

text.*:
This is a list of incidents of violence against women. The cases are sorted by country and year.

Contents

  • 1 Afghanistan
  • 2 Australia
  • 3 Brazil
  • 4 Canada
  • 5 Colombia
  • 6 Ethiopia
  • 7 Germany
  • 8 Greece
  • 9 India
  • 10 Mexico
  • 11 Nigeria
  • 12 Pakistan
  • 13 Peru
  • 14 Spain
  • 15 Sweden

  • 17 United Arab Emirates
  • 18 United Kingdom
  • 19 United States
  • 20 Other
  • 21 References

Spain[edit]

Main article: List of incidents of violence against women in Spain
Main category: Violence against women in Spain

In the last decade about 700 women have been killed in Spain by their partners or ex-partners in cases of violence against women.[1] Since 1999, the number of killed women is over 1,000.
